rooms.name: Spawn Room
rooms.description: You are in a inside of a room with 4 walls. There are family pictures on all of the walls and a few torches on the walls. You can see a sword, shield, bow, and a spear. the room has one exit leading west.

rooms.name: Test Dummy Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a skeleton in the middle with one exit heading west. The room is filled with a bunch of pots and a statue of Hades and a few torches.

rooms.name: Boon Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with three glowing boons. The room has one exit heading West. The Room has three statues of different gods and a few torches and family picture.

rooms.name: F1 1st Attack Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading South and West. The room is filled with pots and a bag tucked away in the corner of the room and lanterns lighting it up.

rooms.name: F1 2nd Attack Room West
rooms.description: You are in a room with some monsters and two exits heading West and East. The room also has lanterns lighting up the room

rooms.name: F1 2nd Attack Room South
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading West and South. The room looks to have a few family pictures hung up with torches lighting them up.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room West 1
rooms.description: You are in a room with some monsters and two exits heading East and South. the room is very plain other then a few torches hung around

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room East
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading East and West. The room has a few torches lighting it up with a few pots laying around on the ground.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room West 2
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading West and South. The room has two lanterns hung up beside the exits and a nice view to the river of souls.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room South
rooms.description: You are in a room with some monsters and two exits heading West and South. The room also has a few torches beside a family picture with some pots around it.

rooms.name: F1 NPC Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a man with a chain attached to him connecting to a boulder and one exit heading West with a skull above it. The room has a few green torches lighting it up green and a pickaxe beside the man.

rooms.name: F1 Mini Boss Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with two giant bony skeletons with bombs on their backs blocking the one exit heading West and a glowing boon behind them. The room you are in has a shattered pieces of broken pots and what looks like a area that looks to have been exploded.

rooms.name: F1 6th Attack Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters with the two exits heading West and North with a few torches around the exits.

rooms.name: F1 7th Attack Room North
rooms.description: You are in a room with some monsters with the two exits heading West and North. The room also has a few torches and pots scattered around the room.

rooms.name: F1 7th Attack Room West
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters with the two exits heading West and South. The room also has a few pots and a family picture.

rooms.name: F1 8th Attack Room West 1
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters with the two exits heading South and North. The room looks like all the other rooms you have been in but with a coin symbol above the exit.

rooms.name: F1 8th Attack Room South
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters with the two exits heading South and West. The room looks like all the other rooms you have been in but with a coin symbol above the exit.

rooms.name: F1 8th Attack Room North
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters with the two exits heading North and West. The room looks like all the other rooms you have been in but with a coin symbol above the exit.

rooms.name: F1 8th Attack Room Weset 2
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters with the two exits heading North and West. The room looks like all the other rooms you have been in but with a coin symbol above the exit.

rooms.name: F1 Shop
rooms.description: You are in a room with a man covered in a robe with glowing purple eyes. Beside the man you can see a bunch of items and one exit heading West with a skull.

rooms.name: F1 Boss Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with somebody staring at you with a whip in their hand and wings on their back. The only way up is being blocked by them with a glowing boon also behind them.
